item.title: Course Reader (Physics 7)
item.descrip: Quiz handling, including scanning, data entry, and score calculation from grading codes; printing copies of in-class worksheets for thousands of students
item.skills: Scripting in FileMaker database software; large course administration

item.title: Lab Assistant
item.inst: IMPROVE Air Quality Group (Crocker Nuclear Lab)
item.descrip: First 5 months: Sample preparation and processing and data handling for IMPROVE air quality monitoring sites Next 6 months: Designed and carried out an experiment studying the impact of denuder pre-filtration on air quality sampling data.
item.skills: Use of delicate equipment e.g. mass balances; experiment design, data analysis and interpretation

item.title: Assistant Mechanic

item.skills: Basic technical skills, basic automotive maintenance and repair
